sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnwikibkmk ( WIKI_BKMK_ID , user_id , wiki_bkmk_nm , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm ) VALUES ( #wikiBkmkId# , #userId# , #wikiBkmkNm# , #frstRegisterId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnwikibkmk SET wiki_bkmk_id = #wikiBkmkId# , user_id = #userId# , wiki_bkmk_nm = #wikiBkmkNm# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# WHERE wiki_bkmk_id = #wikiBkmkId# AND user_id = #userId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnwikibkmk WHERE wiki_bkmk_id = #wikiBkmkId# AND user_id = #userId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT wiki_bkmk_id , user_id , wiki_bkmk_nm , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnwikibkmk WHERE wiki_bkmk_id = #wikiBkmkId# AND user_id = #userId#

SELECT wiki_bkmk_id , user_id , wiki_bkmk_nm , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnwikibkmk WHERE 1=1
wiki_bkmk_id = #searchKeyword#
user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY wiki_bkmk_id DESC , user_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnwikibkmk WHERE 1=1
wiki_bkmk_id = #searchKeyword#
user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
